main event: A cigar-shaped reddish object was sighted in Glenavon, California on 21 June 1955. The object was the size of a dime held at arm's length, and visibility was reported to be five miles.
interesting points: The UFO was described as cigar-shaped and reddish in color, resembling the size of a dime held at arm's length.
Radio contact was established with the USAF, indicating official documentation of the sighting.
The report specifies 'Ground-Visual', suggesting that the object was observed from the ground rather than from an aircraft.
Visibility was reported to be five miles, indicating clear viewing conditions at the time of the sighting.
The report notes that the object was definitely 'A/C', which may refer to 'Aircraft' or 'Alien Craft', leaving the nature of the object open to interpretation.
photographs: no photographs mentioned in the report
